name: FishFish
description:
After playing SharkShark! on the Intellivision. I wanted to make my own version of the game after finding out the Amico system was delayed again I thought, lets give it a go. This is the most advanced Love2d Game I've done due to all the things going on in it. The game assets including art and sound are all from opengameart website and I take no credit for these.

Using the arrow keys on your keyboard, you are the blue fish, all you need to do is eat the other orange fish, avoid the jelly fish as they will freeze you for a certain amount of time and dont get caught by the evil fish. Try and get the highest score you can.
